item.title: Help with drops please will rep
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Open npchandler.java and search for

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

A little bit under that add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { ItemHandler.addItem(####, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Change the first #### to the npc’s id and the second #### to the item you want it to drop. If you would like to know how to make an npc drop random items just ask. By the way you only have 11 rep so you can’t rep.

Read full topic
